not_before.description: The date that validity of the certificate begins

pem.description: Original request PEM or resulting PEM of the request

sigalg.description: Hash Digest followed by format of the key

key_role.description: KEY role, is this a client TLS certificate key? is this a server or a CA

public_signature_fingerprint.description: KEY SHA1/MD5 sum of the public key

fingerprint_algorithm.description: KEY whether the signature fingerprint is MD5 or SHA1

algorithm.description: KEY the underlying algorithm like RSA or ed25519

signature_type.description: ISSUER Signature algorithm, 'type' of signature and how to validate it
